name: Authorize.Net (AIM)
description: Allows customers to choose Authorize.Net (AIM) payment method during checkout.
author: SamPoyigi

tags.1.0.0: Initial tag of authorize net (AIM) extension
tags.1.0.1: Added option to enter billing address during checkout when authorize.net is selected as payment method
tags.1.0.2: Fixed issue where authorize.net orders show as canceled
tags.1.0.3: Fixed issue with authorize billing address
tags.1.1.0: Update code to use latest Extension API
